title: So Riot......I hear you ban these people. Or is it just all talk and no action??
body:
Sick of toxic kids in my games. Apparently Riot bans them, but all I see is them still ruining peoples games after 10 detailed reports.

Tui: Yea Right

replies.body: yeah naming and shaming isnt allowed because then everyone toxic would be vilified and not have a good time, which means theres less chance of them throwing money at riot
Though I must admit, it is AWFULLY satisfying.
What is this, you actaully took a pic of your screen? God bless.
Yep, made sure I caught at least one
There's a print screen button on your keyboard. It takes a cap of the current screen, it's a wonderful button.

> [{quoted}](name=noogai,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MNdAu1YI,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-25T07:21:16.391+0000)
>
> There's a print screen button on your keyboard. It takes a cap of the current screen, it's a wonderful button.

there's also a screenshot button for league.
omg toxic player this toxic player that get over it and mute them
Don't call people out in the forums mate. If that was allowed we would literally have nothing but these kinds of threads.
There's no point in blocking there names since someone could easily check my match history and see who they where

> [{quoted}](name=GCSBBlitzForever,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MNdAu1YI,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-09-25T00:56:07.257+0000)
>
> There's no point in blocking there names since someone could easily check my match history and see who they where

it's still against the rules though.
